overview: Based on the popular tv show 1 Girl 5 Gays, Tyr Alexander leads the group in a sexy Q&A session before getting drilled by Cole Streets, Trevor Knight, Troy Collins and Rex Roddick in Jizz Orgy. Five fit studs are sitting at a table with a deck of cards. A commanding voice explains the rules of the game: each player selects a card and the lowest card must complete a sexual task given by the voice. The coach and four guys on the team are in the shower talking about going out for a night on the town. When one of the guys notices that the coach has a boner a potentially awkward situation turns into an orgy. Four of Johnny Rapid's buddies decide to play a prank that turns into an amazing group session.
title: Jizz Orgy 1
